Text:
waiting 2 hours is pretty fast.. it is also not a very popular network tv show thats been around for seasons.

otherwise pay for cable, i dont and l saved money and dont have to watch stupid commercials!

OH MY GOD! I HAD TO WAIT 2 WHOLE HOURS FOR YOU TO RIP AND ENCODE AND UPLOAD THIS! THE HORROR!!!

Fuck that. Be grateful you get it so quickly and in crisp quality.

A: 10/10
V: 10/10

Thanks, gimpy. You are a lifesaver and my own personal Jesus. :)

Thanks JuggaloForLyfe and everyone else that always have positive things to say. It's nice to see every once in awhile.
